1.0.0.en: First release with 2 devices. Lets give it a run and see if it works ok

1.0.1.en: Additional readme content and links to source and forum

1.1.0.en: Added support for the H6052 and H6144 devices

1.3.0.en: Added 3 more devices and API key bug fix

1.3.2.en: Added several new devices from API 1.4

1.3.3.en: Minor bug fix for devices H619B and C variants

1.3.4.en: Another minor fix to the H619C device

1.4.0.en: Added an Unknown device to support new devices

1.4.1.en: added a patch to prevent crashes in some color temp scenarios

1.5.1.en: added a poll interval setting, and brightness bug fix for some devices

1.5.2.en: Attempt to fix homey pro 2023 support

2.1.0.en: Major rework on device driver, merged to single driver

2.2.0.en: Fix for colors and color temp

2.5.0.en: Added support for local api devices

2.6.0.en: Rewrite to Govee API v2 with light scene support

2.6.1.en: added support for musicMode and snapshots

2.6.4.en: Added support for segment control through flow

2.7.0.en: Rewrite to API v2 now includes appliances

2.8.0.en: Improved pairing and added cloud enhanced local device support

2.8.2.en: Added support for Homey cloud/bridge for the cloud devices

2.8.3.en: Fix on hue, saturation flow support

2.8.4.en: Minor improvments, added set random scene action card

2.8.7.en: Small fix on snapshots for cloud devices

2.9.0.en: Added generic support for the Event system

2.9.2.en: Another fix on events not firing in certain scenarios

2.9.3.en: Added work mode support to all appliance devices

2.10.0.en: Replaced some images and hints, moved slider UI to advanced settings

2.10.4.en: Small resource cleanups and status of local devices when updated using cloud event

2.11.7.en: Minor issues that could cause the app to crash

2.12.3.en: hotfix on localdevice state changes crash

2.12.4.en: Fix for Cloud enhance settings not stored

2.13.0.en: Manual reset for empty tank event

2.13.1.en: Update for new humidty sensor data response

2.15.0.en: Added target temp support for devices that have this capability
